author: Sara Fischer
title: Boomers to Zoomers: Older generations learn to love video chat during coronavirus crisis
description: Expect more family video chats from grandma and grandpa moving forward, even after stay-at-home orders come to an end. Driving the news : Passover seders and Easter celebrations across the country prompted several seniors to finally take the plunge and downlo…
